subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Nebraska cornerback Alfonzo Dennard, who has been projected as a possible second- or third-round pick in this week’s N.F.L. draft, was arrested early Saturday after a fight outside a bar in Lincoln.
snippet: Nebraska cornerback Alfonzo Dennard, who has been projected as a possible second- or third-round pick in this week’s N.F.L. draft, was arrested early Saturday after a fight outside a bar in Lincoln.
